summary:
Skyrim — Hellga Followers.

Body: UNPB.
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim — Hellga
Mod author: Artem5376
Version: 2.0.1
I represent to your attention new Followers — Hellga.
Hellga — Unbound Dremora, who can join the Dovahkiin in his travels.
Hellga autonomous Followers (i.e. no other mods are required), with a unique appearance. 
You can find her at "[i][url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/The_Chill]The Chill[/url][/i]".
Body: UNPB.
Installation: standard — Data, to connect.[img]https://pp.userapi.com/c834203/v834203575/5b00d/hgrIw8MmsAA.jpg[/img][img]https://pp.userapi.com/c834203/v834203575/5b02b/JSK3F2EA3mQ.jpg[/img][img]https://pp.userapi.com/c834203/v834203575/5b049/mDKmJ6Z7KnU.jpg[/img][img]https://pp.userapi.com/c834203/v834203575/5b05d/E7veQGRQwRo.jpg[/img]
author: Artem5376
